messages.message:
Drupal Developer Position

Brian, 

I'm the operations manager at Elevated Third, a Denver based Drupal shop, and I noticed you are open to new opportunities on your Linkedin profile. We currently have an open Drupal developer position at the company and I thought you might be a good fit for it. Would you be interested in learning more about the position? 

Thanks for time,

-Tony

Anthony Dryer
952 412 8541 | tonydryer5@gmail.com
Yikes. Drupal. Last time I used that I stopped because the community has zero organization.

Thanks for taking the time to respond Brian. Best of luck,

-Tony
